com.kaichunlin.transition

Interface ITransition<S extends com.kaichunlin.transition.BaseTransition.Setup>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MenuItemTransition, ViewTransition

    public interface ITransition<S extends com.kaichunlin.transition.BaseTransition.Setup>
extends java.lang.Cloneable
    Represent the operations that should be performed with the given progress, usually performed on a view.

    Created by Kai-Chun Lin on 2015/4/18.
